subject: JUnit cookbook error?
msgSnippet: Hi, Not entirely sure if this is the right place to post this, but in the JUnit cookbook, the instructions for running a test from the command line are wrong
messageBody:
Hi,

Not entirely sure if this is the right place to post this, but in the
JUnit cookbook, the instructions for running a test from the command
line are wrong or misleading, at least for JUnit 4.6.

or this from the command line, with both your test class and junit on
the classpath:

   java org.junit.runner.JUnitCore TestClass1.class [...other test classes...]


The command should probably read:

   java org.junit.runner.JUnitCore package.TestClass1 [...other test
classes...]



-- Sam
